Minnesota.info: Regulates short-term coverage more rigorously than the federal government
Minnesota.enrollment: Does not limit the total length of time a consumer may be enrolled in underwritten short-term coverage***
Minnesota.underwritten: Does not prohibit underwritten short-term coverage*
Minnesota.contract: Limits the initial contract duration of underwritten short-term coverage to 185 days**
